transcript.title: Visit by President of Israel
transcript.content:
10 September 1986

I Â am pleased to announce that the President of Israel, HisÂ Excellency Mr Chaim Herzog, has accepted an invitation to visitÂ Australia in November as a guest of the Government. Â 

From its foundation Israel has shared with Australia an abidingÂ commxitment to democratic principles and a parliamentary system ofÂ Government.

The Jewish community in Australia has made a deep andÂ wide-ranving contribution to the development of our nationalÂ culture and traditions.Â 

President Herzog's visit will enhance further the warmÂ relationship between our two countries.

Further detailsÂ will be announced at a time closer to the date ofÂ Â the visit.
